com.clarkparsia.common.io
Class EncryptedFile

java.lang.Object
  java.io.File
      com.clarkparsia.common.io.EncryptedFile
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<java.io.File>
public final class EncryptedFile
extends java.io.File

A extended File which will return an input or output stream for reading and writing to the file in an encrypted/decrypted manner. The same key must be used to read from an encrypted file as was used to write to it.

Since:
1.0
Author:
Michael Grove
See Also:
Serialized Form

decrypt

public static java.io.InputStream decrypt(java.io.InputStream theStream,
                                          java.lang.String theKey)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
Returns an InputStream that will decrypt the bytes coming in through the specified input using the given key

Parameters:
theStream - the stream to read encrypted data from
theKey - the key to use for decryption
Returns:
an input stream that will decrypt the data
Throws:
java.io.IOException - thrown if the stream cannot be read from, or if there is an error while decrypting
